name: The Final Exam
description:
It's that time of year at Penny's wizarding school! Help her pass the final exam!

WASD to move.
Left Mouse Button to attack.
"Q" to switch between ice & fire attacks.
"X" to use healing elixir.
"E" to view and exit instructions.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi there!

So, this is my first game done essentially by myself (with help, of course, when I got stuck). I had made one before as a gift, but I really only did the art and very minor tweaks, while someone else did the visual scripting for me (I didn't know what I was doing back then LOL). So, I'm counting this as my official first (public) game. 

Anyway, I hope you like it! It's nowhere near perfect and I have a lot to work on, but I'm still very proud that I made a finished product ^_^
